transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan ji Vivek ji Vivek bol raha hu mai se baat kar sakta hu?
Executive: Sir aapka call aa raha tha na us time ka haan haan bataiye.
Customer: Sir mai bol raha tha mere pass lead show nahi ho rahi hai Marvel temple ke regarding ke regarding.
Executive: Theek hai mai ek baar aapko guide kar deta hu check bhi kar leta hu theek hai aap mujhe bataye ki ji aap hi use karenge aap hi handle karenge koi aur person bhi hai aapke sath.
Customer: Koi koi aur person bhi hai.
Executive: Achcha to primary number Ayan ji ka hai ye use karte hai kya andar isko?
Customer: Ji ji primary number Ayan ji ka hai wo bhi use karte hai aur mere bhai.
Executive: Achcha bhai hai haan bataya unhone meri baat hui thi abhi Amit sahi to unhone bataya ki thoda health issue hai unhe to that's why wo abhi use kar rahe hai aap hi use kar rahe hai na.
Customer: Haan haan ji haan ji haan ji theek hai theek hai to apna jo main product mai dekh pa raha hu ki yaha par jo hamara jo main product hai wo hai wo hai marble temple hai apna right marble temple hai sir ji marble temple me deal karte hai hum mainly right.
Customer: Marble temple and fountain dono me deal karte hai.
Executive: Achcha marble fountain ye bhi fountain bhi marble ka hi rehta hai na apna.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji marble ka.
Executive: Theek hai yani ki fountain bhi marble ka rehta hai aur jo temple rehta hai wo bhi marble ka rehta hai.
Customer: Ji ji ji theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai to apna main product ye do product hai marble temple aur marble fountain theek hai ji ji sir location kya kya deal karte hai pan India deal karte hai ya locally deal karte hai aap.
Customer: Pan pan India pan India.
Executive: Pan India theek hai.
Executive: Mai aapka profile update kar deta hu.
Executive: Aap kis cheez se through check karte hai mainly laptop use karte hai ya mobile aap use karte hai.
Customer: Laptop use karte hai mainly laptop use karte hai mobile to use hi nahi karte.
Executive: Laptop kafi easy to use hota hai easily aap carry kar sakte hai use kar sakte hai.

Executive: Right now aap online hai kya laptop pe aap.
Customer: Haan ji online system pe baitha hu.
Executive: Achcha theek hai theek hai mai aapko ek meeting invitation de raha hu ek baar join kariye usko.
Executive: Vivek Vivek naam se mila hai kya?
Customer: Mail mail mere pass nahi aayega bhai ke pass jayega.
Executive: Mai whatsapp kar du aap mujhe whatsapp number bataiye apna.
Customer: Same number hai jis number me call kiya hai aapne.
Executive: Ek baar number bol dijiye mujhe dikhai nahi de raha hai abhi 91 91 66 66 33 33 27 27 85 85
Executive: Theek hai maine aapko message dala hai mujhe hi likh dijiye udhar se maine hello likha hai udhar se aap is number ko save bhi kar lena aapko koi concern query aati hai to mai hi aapka account manager hu theek hai aur mujhe hi aap call karenge Vivek Vivek naam hai mera Vivek haan aap mere se hi baat karenge mai hi aapko coordinate karunga aur kahi bhi call karenge to mere pass hi aana hai right jaise aapne call kiya tha abhi customer care number pe call kiya tha kya aapne.
Customer: Customer care number pe call kiya tha wo call bhi mere pass hi wo call bhi mere pass hi aata hai right lekin us time me mere ko number dikhega nahi aapka ki kaun call kar raha hai mujhe right jaise abhi nahi dikhai de raha hai to maine aapka number pucha theek hai to aapko jab bhi call karna hai wo mere directly number pe kariyega right taki mere ko bhi idea rahe mai aapka number bhi save kar leta hu ji theek hai taki mere ko idea rahe ki aapka call aa raha hai clear hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Video call abhi karoge.
Executive: Haan mai bhej raha hu aapko.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Join kar lijiye google meet se karoge.
Executive: Haan google meet join karenge na to easily mai apna screen present kar paunga.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Aapke laptop me mic wagera hai.
Customer: Mic wagera laptop me to mai abhi
Executive: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hai unhone aapki call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving leads.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to guide and check.

- Executive updated the customer's profile.

- Executive shared meeting invite on WhatsApp.

- Executive shared his direct number for future calls.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to join Google Meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, marble temple, account handling, google meet
